    RunIndexingServer
    index et stop -server -Xmx500m -Djava.rmi.server.codebase="file:///c:/JG/prog/myCAT/dist/mysearch.jar" -Djava.security.policy="c:/MYCAT/rmi.policy"

    reconstruit les structures de l'indexeur
